title: Pog & Dar: Cop Landlords
description: The Ferengi series like a holonovel but way sleazier. Pog & Dar deal with the toughest tenants.
quote: You just surrendered your deposit. And your life!
altHero: two Ferengi cops stand back to back and fire guns in the rain
alt1: an old Ferengi man sits on a couch holding an alien dog
alt3: Pog holding a bottle of Slug-o-Cola
